description:
GitHub is enhancing its AI-powered coding assistant, Copilot, to make it more autonomous and integrated with developers’ workflows. Headlining the updates is the general availability rollout of ‘Agent Mode’ in Visual Studio Code, enhanced Model Context Protocol (MCP) support, and the introduction of several new large language models (LLMs) accessible via a premium request system.... Read more »

The post GitHub boosts Copilot with agents, new models, and MCP support appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: GitHub boosts Copilot with agents, new models, and MCP support
